title: How to manage my old blog posts - Quora

response.answer_text: Managing old blog post? Take care of following points, and you are likely to boost the reach of your blog post. Proofread the blogpost for quality, uniqueness and grammar.Make sure the keywords you are using have good search volume.Make sure the blogpost is SEO friendly and follows latest SEO and content norms set by google Or other respective search engineAnalyze the content on Yoast for SEO and content gudelinesWrite short and relevant meta title and meta description completely relevant to the blog.Take reference from other blogging sites to know what they’re doing for their blog post.

Thank you for the request to answer: How do I manage my old blog posts? I think the best way to answer this is to direct you to one of my previous answers which should give you the information you need. Susan Pearson's answer to Should I delete a blog post that has no clicks and impressions in the last 6 months period? I hope that helps.
